name: Doc Miau and the Failed LD47Jam
name_original: Doc Miau and the Failed LD47Jam
description:
Well this is the contribution of @floxy and I for the 47th Ludum Dare game-jam. This time technical difficulties plagued us, so we decided to just throw our assets into a scene.
Our original idea, was a short key-card-hunt throw an underground lab with the twist, that whenever you die, your previous runs are still performing what you've done before. You would have needed to evade your past incarnations, to prevent a time- paradox to erase both of you, so you could avert your original self from destroying the universe
